H0.text: What is an astronomical event that occurs when one celestial object moves into the shadow of another. Occultation

H1.text: What is an astronomical event that occurs when one celestial object moves into the shadow of another. Transit

H2.text: What is an astronomical event that occurs when one celestial object moves into the shadow of another. Umbra

H3.text: What is an astronomical event that occurs when one celestial object moves into the shadow of another. Eclipse

A4.text: A solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between Earth and the Sun, thereby obscuring the view of the Sun from a small part of Earth, totally or partially.

A5.text: In a total eclipse, the disk of the Sun is fully obscured by the Moon. In partial and annular eclipses, only part of the Sun is obscured.
